about_the_game: This demo showcases the first fifteen levels of the Disk Dashers campaign, showcasing the core mechanics behind the turn-based physics strategy game.
detailed_description: This demo showcases the first fifteen levels of the Disk Dashers campaign, showcasing the core mechanics behind the turn-based physics strategy game.
name: Disk Dashers Demo

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
